author: Special Correspondent
title: Gautam Navlakha hopes for speedy, fair trial ahead of surrender to NIA
description: Mr. Navlakha, like activist-academic Anand Teltumbde, has been charged under the Unlawful Activities (Prevention) Act (UAPA).
content: Human rights activist and journalist Gautam Navlakha, who plans to surrender to the National Investigation Agency (NIA) on Tuesday for his alleged involvement in the Bhima-Koregao riots of 2018, said he hoped for a speedy and fair trial for himself and other … [+4347 chars]
